text:
但是，对于那些难以在活动期间参加仪式的人，请在当地教会的天宝大役事结束后给予特别圣烛的点燃。 获得此恩典的条件是报名参加2024年秋季天宝特别大役事。
下面将介绍天宝大役事之后向会员点燃圣烛的方法。
大役事时间: 10 月 18 日（星期五） ~ 20 日（星期日）
继承圣烛的时间: 12月31日（星期日）24:00前
trans:
However, for those who find it difficult to attend the ceremony during the event, special candles will be lit after the local church's Tianbao Grand Ritual ends. The condition to receive this grace is to register for the 2024 Autumn Tianbao Special Grand Ritual.
Below is the method for lighting the holy candle for members after the Tianbao Grand Ritual.
Event Time: October 18 (Friday) ~ 20 (Sunday)
Time for inheriting the holy candle: By 24:00 on December 31 (Sunday)
